GSD.description:
ext2: Add more validity checks for inode counts

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 96b18d3a1be0354ccce43f0ef61b5a3d7e432552. For more details please see the references link.
